evidence_assessment: deemed inadmissible, but evidence shows no senior official status or involvement in atrocities

Different Crime.Crime Name: Inadmissibility for being a prescribed senior official in the service of a government engaging in human rights violations
evidentiary_standard: lacked on military hierarchy and his role's significance
reasonableness_of_decision: decision denying his sponsorship was unreasonable
judicial_review_process: Judicial review in Federal Court analyzing IRPA sections and evidence sufficiency
decision_outcome: Court granted judicial review, allowing Mr. Lutfi to potentially seek an exemption
